creator: APPLIFE LIMITED
descriptionHtml:
Do you see yourself in the role of an interior designer?🏡 It’s time to find out and play your favorite genre - home renovation and decoration! Merge Decor combines elements of merge puzzle and decorating games. Unlike other merge games, this one gives you full control over the creative process of decoration, renovation, and home restoration. 👍 Show off your skills and become a professional home designer while playing Merge Decor mansion games!🏘️

Design and decorate your dream house; go from a simple living room in a humble home to a massive mansion with a garden and a pool. Match patterns, decorate homes, and build your dreamhouse.🤩 As the player, you are the main interior designer of and you can decorate a manor. Your job is to collect tools and equipment, 🔧🔨 use them to renovate various spaces and buildings, and turn old rooms, kitchens, and houses into works of art. Build a sweet house from scratch or give a house a complete makeover while playing designing games!😍

Once you enter the world of house decorating games with Merge Decor, you are the main heroine. 👩‍💼You are so good at your job that you now receive regular orders for the decoration of various premises. Create a sweet home for your clients and add it to a portfolio to showcase your amazing remodeling skills. Are you ready for the home design challenge?

STORIES

Each room is an episode and a story, and each story matters. Receive instructions, complete tasks and follow this captivating story as it continues to unfold. Have fun with house games and home decor!

RENOVATE A ROOM

If you want to redecor one room, you need to renew the floors, hang wallpapers, choose a sofa, renew the windows, add furniture, and much more! Enjoy fixing a villa in house building games and relax while creating a sweet home for your clients.

TOOLS

You need tools to use in your home designer adventures. That's where the merge part of the designing game comes in handy. Merge objects and create various tools. For example, if you have two screwdrivers, you can turn them into a hammer. Turn two hammers into a nail puller. A nail puller can have you lay a shiny parquet to transform the room completely. Discover all the tools available in Merge Decor interior design games!

Are you done with one room? Do you want to continue to design homes? Well, you can! As soon as you’re done with one room, another one opens up. New episodes bring about new modern house design elements and upgrade the old ones, making them more complex. As the heroine of these home design games, you have to renovate kitchens, bedrooms, country houses, fashion boutiques, and even ancient castles! Home makeover and interior decorating await you! Let all the other design masters know that you're the real deal!

Have you ever thought to yourself, “I want to design my home”? If so, then you’re in the right place. With Merge Decor, you get to decorate houses through collecting tools and combining elements on the field. You can choose your own style of interior design and furniture and bring your wildest dreams to life. Create a unique design for each room, play renovation games, and become leading interior designer in the world of Merge Decor home decorating game!
descriptionShort: Decorate a dream house, give it a makeover and become an ace interior designer!

Unlike other merge games, this one gives you full control over the creative process of decoration, renovation, and home restoration. 👍 Show off your skills and become a professional home designer while playing Merge Decor mansion games!🏘️

Design and decorate your dream house; go from a simple living room in a humble home to a massive mansion with a garden and a pool. Match patterns, decorate homes, and build your dreamhouse.🤩 As the player, you are the main interior designer of and you can decorate a manor. Your job is to collect tools and equipment, 🔧🔨 use them to renovate various spaces and buildings, and turn old rooms, kitchens, and houses into works of art. Build a sweet house from scratch or give a house a complete makeover while playing designing games!😍

Once you enter the world of house decorating games with Merge Decor, you are the main heroine. 👩‍💼You are so good at your job that you now receive regular orders for the decoration of various premises. Create a sweet home for your clients and add it to a portfolio to showcase your amazing remodeling skills. Are you ready for the home design challenge?

STORIES

Each room is an episode and a story, and each story matters. Receive instructions, complete tasks and follow this captivating story as it continues to unfold. Have fun with house games and home decor!

RENOVATE A ROOM

If you want to redecor one room, you need to renew the floors, hang wallpapers, choose a sofa, renew the windows, add furniture, and much more! Enjoy fixing a villa in house building games and relax while creating a sweet home for your clients.

TOOLS

You need tools to use in your home designer adventures. That's where the merge part of the designing game comes in handy. Merge objects and create various tools. For example, if you have two screwdrivers, you can turn them into a hammer. Turn two hammers into a nail puller. A nail puller can have you lay a shiny parquet to transform the room completely. Discover all the tools available in Merge Decor interior design games!

Are you done with one room? Do you want to continue to design homes? Well, you can! As soon as you’re done with one room, another one opens up. New episodes bring about new modern house design elements and upgrade the old ones, making them more complex. As the heroine of these home design games, you have to renovate kitchens, bedrooms, country houses, fashion boutiques, and even ancient castles! Home makeover and interior decorating await you! Let all the other design masters know that you're the real deal!

Have you ever thought to yourself, “I want to design my home”? If so, then you’re in the right place. With Merge Decor, you get to decorate houses through collecting tools and combining elements on the field. You can choose your own style of interior design and furniture and bring your wildest dreams to life. Create a unique design for each room, play renovation games, and become leading interior designer in the world of Merge Decor home decorating game!
descriptionShort: Decorate a dream house, give it a makeover and become an ace interior designer!

title: Merge Decor: Mansion design

creator: Tilting Point
descriptionHtml:
Would you like to design your own house? Play and match items in our funny puzzle unlocking the best tools for house renovation and decoration in this free casual game: Match and combine elements of a puzzle and create new iterms and tools to design and renovate your dream house.

Unlike other merge puzzles, Merge Decor gives you full control to create, decorate, renovate, and transform your house into a dream home. Show off your merging skills and become a professional mansion designer!

Discover how to design, decorate, paint and renovate your dream house. Match and combine tools in our free puzzle game and turn a simple living room in a humble home into a massive mansion with a garden and a pool. Choose matching patterns and create tools to decorate homes. Build your dream house as an interior designer and decorate a mansion following your own taste. Your job is to collect tools and transform items into upgraded ones. Renovate and paint your home or mansion, 🔧🔨 use tools to update rooms, kitchens, and entire mansions and transform them into pieces of art. Build and move pieces of the puzzle to create a dream house from scratch or give a complete makeover or an entire painting design to the house while playing Merge Decor.

Become the main home designer of your dream house: Help us to renovate and decorate rooms and furniture! Enjoy this opportunity to apply home renovation, unlock tools and discover how to decorate your mansion. Match and connect many tools playing this jigsaw puzzle. Create a confortable home painting. Are you ready for this home renovation challenge?

RENOVATE AND DECORATE TO CREATE AMAZING DESIGNS
Every time you play you'll be painting a new episode of a home design book. Make a portrait of your mansion! Match and merge tools in our puzzle to complete tasks and win tons of rewards!

- Become a true home designer: Use the tools and connect pieces to create the tool that you need to upgrade the home decoration
- Collect items and tools to renovate your rooms and update your dream house
- Connect and combine puzzle tools for home designing
- Show off your house decoration talents and become a house makeover pro
- Learn how to play Merge Decor and renovate your favorite mansion
¡Discover all the tools available in Merge Decor interior design games!

– Enjoy this colorful puzzle game where you can design your dream home. Become absorbed into engaging puzzle levels
- Unlock rewards & collect tools to improve a merge design in different styles
- Design and renovate chic bedrooms, living rooms, stylish bathrooms and rustic kitchens
- Remodel your home with a different style and go from antique to modern! Which design will you choose?
- Match yourself with an incredible variety of furniture, lamps, plants and other design decoration in this free puzzle game

Enjoy puzzle matching tools and merge items to update your furniture design! Create various colors and textures with different home decoration styles.

Are you done with one room or another part of the house or mansion? Do you want furniture to design you home? Match and connect tools for a general makeover of the house! As soon as you’re done with one room, another one opens up. Create a dream house by renovating to transforming it into a mansion! Surprise yourself with a furniture makeover and interior decorating!
descriptionShort: Renovate your mansion to the style you want: Match & merge tools in this puzzle!

A family fun game that lets you collect tools and transform items into upgraded ones. Renovate and paint your home decor or mansion, use tools to update rooms, kitchens, and entire mansions and transform them into pieces of art. Build and move pieces of the puzzle to create a dream house design from scratch or give a complete makeover or an entire painting design to the house while playing Merge Decor.

Become the main home designer of your dream house: Help us to renovate and decorate rooms and furniture! Enjoy this opportunity to apply home renovation, unlock tools and discover how to decorate your mansion. Match and connect many tools playing this jigsaw puzzle. Create a confortable home painting. Are you ready for this home renovation challenge?

RENOVATE AND DECORATE TO CREATE AMAZING DESIGNS
Every time you play you'll be painting a new episode of a home design book. Make a portrait of your mansion! Match and merge tools in our puzzle to complete tasks and win tons of rewards!

- Become a true home designer: Use the tools and connect pieces to create the tool that you need to upgrade the home decoration
- Collect items and tools to renovate your rooms and update your dream house
- Connect and combine puzzle tools for home designing
- Show off your house decoration talents and become a house makeover pro
- Learn how to play Merge Decor and renovate your favorite mansion
¡Discover all the tools available in Merge Decor interior design games!

– Enjoy this colorful puzzle game where you can design your dream home. Become absorbed into engaging puzzle levels
- Unlock rewards & collect tools to improve a merge design in different styles
- Design and renovate chic bedrooms, living rooms, stylish bathrooms and rustic kitchens
- Remodel your home with a different style and go from antique to modern! Which design will you choose?
- Match yourself with an incredible variety of furniture, lamps, plants and other design decoration in this free puzzle game

Enjoy puzzle matching tools and merge items to update your furniture design! Create various colors and textures with different home decoration styles.

Are you done with one room or another part of the house or mansion? Do you want furniture to design you home? Match and connect tools for a general makeover of the house! As soon as you’re done with one room, another one opens up. Create a dream house by renovating to transforming it into a mansion! Surprise yourself with a furniture makeover and interior decorating!
